compliant.section: In addition, you also have the right to data portability in certain cases. This is the right to request the return of the Personal Information you have provided to us in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and to request the transmission of such Personal Information to a third party, without hindrance from us and subject to your own confidentiality obligations.

non_compliant.section: You may view and change your Information by logging in your NUVOTON Member account and editing your account information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Right of access by the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify that the data subject has the right to access, rectify, and erase their personal data, not just view and change it. It should also provide information about other rights like data portability, objection, etc., and how to exercise these rights in a clear and concise manner.
